sentence: But  everything  changed  on  Oct.  7,  when  Hamas  militants  attacked  multiple  locations  in  Israel,  killing  around  1,200  people  and  kidnapping  about  240,  according  to  the  Israeli  government.
Israel  has  responded  with  fierce  bombardment  of  Gaza  that  has  killed  more  than  12,000,  Palestinian  health  officials  say.
